reviews.review: Very Clever level design, full of hidden details, with a good way of introducing a player to a new mechanic and then broadening their idea of how it can be used until they can do anything. the dialog is wonderfully ironic, and even in a bad mood leaves me chuckling.

Wer gerne kluge und verrückte Rätsel erleben möchte, der sollte Portal nicht verpassen. Das Spiel geht nicht lange (ein langer Nachmittag und man hat es durch), sorgt aber mit Humor und kniffligen Rätseln für jede Menge Spaß. Ziemlich häufig muss man um die Ecke denken und sich mit den Portalen neu arrangieren, um überhaupt eine Lösung zu erzielen, aber meistens sind die Level fair und es kommt nur selten zu dem mir gehassten "Das war ein Pixel zu weit links, machs nochmal".
Eine kleine Story erzählt es nebenbei auch noch, nicht zu viel, aber auch nicht zu wenig. Der Sarkasmus ist unerreicht und wird nur vom Nachfolger getoppt.

Really good classic game. I've always loved the portal gun mechanics. The puzzles are fun and at time challenging. Overall this is one really good classic game that I definitely recommend to check out!
the cake is a lie---

One of the most mind blowing games ever. The game's engine takes advantage of the physics, and manages to create a puzzle game. So basically, the game is a puzzle game where you have to enable switches, go through portals and all of that. It's really fun and the challenge is there. The story, while not very clear of what's happening, you can only kind of understand if you check the walls and stuff you kind of understand what this is all about. The antagonist, is probably the most amusing and is very sarcastic with you and it's very funny. I have to note if you are expecting something action-oriented you are probably in the wrong game. So, the ONLY bad thing about this game, is that it's a very short game, and I can understand that because Valve was making something different compared to other games. Overall it's still pretty good and it even has more difficult levels that are basically the same but changes the environment so you have to solve it differently.

I love this game. No matter how many times I replay it, it's always gonna be fun for me. The environment, characters, story, the portal gun itself, oh God. It's so much fun. This game can also serve as a perfect entry point for people who are starting to get into gaming as it's free from any convoluted mechanics while still being an engaging experience. Runs well even on potato PCs.

[h1] Portal [/h1]

| Bir oyunu anlamak için sanırım anlatıma pek gerek yok, adı'da yete biliyor. Adından'da anlaşılacağı üzere baş döndürücü Portal silahımız ile Portal açarak oyunun bizlere sunduğu bulmacaları çözüyoruz. Tavsiyemi isterseniz arkadaşlarınız ile oynayın. Hikayesi elbette etkileyici ancak arkadaşlarınız ile daha'da etkileyici olmakta. Half Life evrenine dolaylı olarak hikaye anlamında bağlı olan bu  oyunda'da aslında arka planda yatan bazı gizemlerin olduğunu belirtmek gerekiyor. Neticede dolaylı olarakta bağlı olsa, gizem her yerde gizem.

Ben başınız dönmeyecek ise sizlere etkileyici ve hazzı dibine kadar yaşatan bu oyunu önermek ile yetineceğim. Oyunu oynadıktan sonra kızlar tuvaletine portal açan sapıklar için garanti kabul etmiyoruz, iyi günler ve oyunlar dileriz.
3D眩晕,但游戏是好游戏
